description: Try our easy to follow Raspberry & Elderflower Yoghurt Granola Pots recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Granola,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg free,Raspberry,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apr 2020
name: Raspberry & Elderflower Yoghurt Granola Pots Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup granola, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Using a fork, mash raspberries and cordial in a bowl.
Spoon half the yoghurt into 4 x 11/2 cup-capacity jars, followed by half the raspberry mixture. Add granola, then remaining yoghurt and raspberry mixture.
Top with berries, pistachios and extra granola. Secure with lids.
